text: George Harold Clements (January 26, 1932 - November 25, 2019) was an American Roman Catholic priest. In 1981, became the first Catholic priest in the Chicago area to adopt a child.Father george clements. (n.d.) In June 1969, Father Clements became the first black pastor of Holy Angels Catholic Church on the South Side of Chicago. Richardson, J. (2003, April 23).
